A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Definitely a controversial 'Star Wars' movie that has divided fans of the series\, possibly the Director's intention. Literally\, takes the sequel trilogy to a different level; almost going in the opposite direction as to what Abrams did with 'The Force Awakens'\, which is what the fans wanted to begin with\, but not at the results they were predicting; possibly the reason why I did enjoy this entry in the series as well. More surprises\, than answers\, but possibly has some of the best battle scenes of any of the other movies in the series\, but also has some of the most bizarre at the same time.
